DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy Acclarent Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System ( TDS ) placement Tympanostomy Tube TT ( ) local anesthesia deliver iontophoresis office/clinic setting .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled undergo tympanostomy tube insertion At least 6 month old Behavioral capacity cooperative temperament undergo awake procedure ( base physician judgement ) No history sensitivity reaction anesthesia choose procedure Pregnant lactating female Significantly atrophic , bimeric , completely atelectatic tympanic membrane Otitis externa Lacerations abrasion external auditory canal damage denude skin auditory canal Cerumen impaction result significant amount cleaning require visualize tympanic membrane Electrically sensitive subject subject electrically sensitive support system ( pacemaker , defibrillator , etc . ) Anatomy preclude sufficient visualization access tympanic membrane Anatomy necessitate tympanostomy tube placement posterior half tympanic membrane
